info.name: This works?
info.description: 3D projection using an equation, (which apparently works even though I don't know why).

renderpass.code: void mainImage( out vec4 o, vec2 i ){vec2 v = i.xy / iResolution.xy;float z = -(atan(v.y-0.5)+tan(v.y-0.5));v+=z*iDate.w;v/=z;o=texture(iChannel0, v)*z;}
renderpass.name: Image
